title: Where Darkness Dwells
description: In the blink of an eye, your entire world can be thrust into darkness. In the blink of an eye, your entire world can fall to pieces.As a seventeen year-old senior at Palisades High School in Palisades, Colorado, Caleb Sutton has a good life. He's popular. Gets good grades. Plays sports. Life at home is good.When classes begin, Caleb is partnered up with Evangeline "Evie" Drake for their AP Biology class. Even though she doesn't have the monetary status behind her, Evie, as Student Body President, is just as popular as Caleb. While they aren't friends at first, the two seniors develope an easy-going relationship as a result of their time as lab partners. With that newfound friendship, Caleb begins to develop stronger feelings toward Evie. Feelings, he hopes one day to explore.And then one night in November changes everything. Snatched by unknown assailants and thrust into a world of darkness and torture, Caleb and Evie must fight to stay alive, to stay sane, all while hoping someone somewhere is working on rescuing them from their nightmare before it's too late.Sensitive Subject Matter. Reader Discretion Advised. Strong language. Adult content. 18+
author: Lynnette Brisia
